    直接已知子类:
    ToolbarPopupEntry

    public class ToolbarEntry
extends com.vaadin.ui.CustomComponent
    Entry to use in a tool bar. Shows label and optional count.
    作者:
    Frederik Heremans, Joram Barrez
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

        public void setCount(Long count)
        Sets the count to be displayed. When count is null, no count-component will be shown.
